name: Music Puzzle © Play the Music!
description:
You've never played a game like this one. Music Puzzle is a unique gaming experience, where you arrange songs from famous artists around the world. Each puzzle reflects a part of a song and contains various tracks representing different instruments.
 
Guitars, drums, voices or more exotic instruments like congas and the tambourine, it is your turn to listen to them carefully and sort them in the right order. 
You can always listen to the original and compare it with your current progress. Use your ears and improve your hearing abilities to master the game. Different game modes and challenges will provide hours of gameplay with your favorite songs. Are you able to solve a puzzle with only a limited number of moves? Can you achieve the blind modes?
 
Our studio wanted to create something really unique and Music Puzzle is celebrating music artists and their work. 
 
Whether you are a music pro or not at all, the satisfaction is guaranteed. Players can contribute to artistic creation and join the community to vote for their favorite artists and a chance to have them included into the game. Share your solved puzzles with your friends and see who is the best puzzler! 
 
Music Puzzle is a relaxing game, that requires patience. Solving a puzzle can take hours just like in real life. Besides being fun, Music Puzzle also helps you to improve your musical intelligence.

Time to clean your ears and dive into this completely new unique musical journey.
 
FEATURES:
- An immersive experience into the artist's music
- Develop musical cognition
- Train ears to different instruments
- All the puzzles are hand-made
- Several difficulty levels
- Puzzles ranging from 20 pieces to 56!!
- Hints in case you're blocked
 
And, of course, great songs!
 
Play the Music!!! 
 
Full Lineup:
Garbage, James Blunt, Milky Chance, Killerpilze, The Pointer Sisters, Supergrass, Starsailor, Devilment, Vault of Valor, Elsten Torres, Dannah Garay, The Mixy Welders, Nation, Silverpalms, Lybellulla, Seekers Keepers, Communion, Hello Seahorse, La Gusana Ciega, Carla Morrison, Mozart, Vivaldi, Beethoven
